rmod:maingunfire.NAME: Большая семёрка
rmod:maingunfire.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. NL Отнимает 1 Боеприпас. NL Наносит !D! урона если вы теряли Боеприпасы.

rmod:launchingtorpedo.NAME: Тревога Наршевика
rmod:launchingtorpedo.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. NL Отнимает 1 Боеприпас. NL Накладывает !M! Уязвимости если вы теряли Боеприпасы.

rmod:royalracing.NAME: Royal Racing
rmod:royalracing.DESCRIPTION: Вы берёте !M! карты. NL Отнимает 1 Топливо. NL Уменьшает стоимость взятых карт на 1 на этот ход если вы теряли Боеприпасы.

rmod:expedition.NAME: Частая экспедиция
rmod:expedition.DESCRIPTION: В начале каждого хода, NL Даёт !M! случайных Ресурсов. NL Может быть улучшенна 3 раза.

rmod:auspiciousomen.NAME: Auspicious
rmod:auspiciousomen.DESCRIPTION: Снимает ВСЕ отриц. эффекты,then remove Y buff. NL (Y is the number of debuff removed - X)
rmod:auspiciousomen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all debuff,then remove Y buff. NL (Y is the number of debuff removed - X-1)

rmod:timeschanged.NAME: Time Changed
rmod:timeschanged.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL (X is the number of Vulnerable of the enemy.) NL Remove all Vulnerable.

rmod:diamond.NAME: Diamond
rmod:diamond.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Upgrade 1 card in hand this combat. NL Exhaust.
rmod:diamond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

rmod:chargemoney.NAME: Charge Money
rmod:chargemoney.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL Add 1 Diamond into your hand.

rmod:aviationsupport.NAME: Aviation Support
rmod:aviationsupport.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 6 times. NL Exhaust.

rmod:capitalist.NAME: The Capitalists
rmod:capitalist.DESCRIPTION: Replenish Ammunition and Steel to 5. NL At the end of this turn, NL Gain !M! Weak. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

rmod:luckystar.NAME: Lucky Star
rmod:luckystar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL 50% chance to repeat.

rmod:unsinkable.NAME: Unsinkable Warship
rmod:unsinkable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Steel. NL If you lost Steel, NL Gain !B! Block.

rmod:fletcherpendant.NAME: Fletcher Component
rmod:fletcherpendant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

rmod:fletcher.NAME: The Best Destroyers
rmod:fletcher.DESCRIPTION: For ALL Fletcher Components, NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

rmod:heivgo.NAME: Italian Design
rmod:heivgo.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Steel. NL If you lost Steel, NL Gain 1 Buffer.

rmod:salvage.NAME: Salvage
rmod:salvage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, NL (Add Fletcher Component to your deck. [80%]) NL (Add The Best Destroyers to your deck. [20%])
rmod:salvage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, NL (Add Fletcher Component to your deck. [80%]) NL (Add The Best Destroyers to your deck. [20%]) NL 50% chance for the card to be Upgraded.

rmod:ring.NAME: Ring
rmod:ring.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all Statuses and Curses. NL For each Diamond exhausted, NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

rmod:goodsister.NAME: Good Sisters
rmod:goodsister.DESCRIPTION: Fletcher Components Exhaust. NL When Components are Exhausted: NL Add The Best Destroyers to your hand from your Draw pile. NL OR. NL Draw !M! card.

rmod:circuitoustactics.NAME: Tactical Manoeuvre
rmod:circuitoustactics.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 1 Fuel. NL If you lost Fuel, NL Add 2 random cards to your hand from the Discard pile.

rmod:openingtorpedo.NAME: Opening Torpedo
rmod:openingtorpedo.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

rmod:seals.NAME: The Seal
rmod:seals.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, NL Select 1 card from your draw pile, it costs 0 until played and is placed at the top of draw pile.
rmod:seals.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, NL Select 1 card from your draw pile, it costs 0 until played and is placed at the top of draw pile.

rmod:lonelyqueen.NAME: The Lonely Queen Df the North
rmod:lonelyqueen.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALl enemies. NL Lose 1 Steel. NL If you lost Steel, NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

rmod:punchline.NAME: The Key Attack
rmod:punchline.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to the card's target.

rmod:saltedfish.NAME: Salted Fish
rmod:saltedfish.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, if you played less than !M! attacks, NL Gain 2 of each Resource.

rmod:wife.NAME: Lexington Power
rmod:wife.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Lose 1 Fuel. NL If you lost Fuel, NL The random card with the highest cost in your hand consumes 0 energy this turn. NL Exhaust.
rmod:wife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Lose 1 Fuel. NL If you lost Fuel, NL The random card with the highest cost in your hand consumes 0 energy this turn.

rmod:wolves.NAME: Wolf Pack Tactics
rmod:wolves.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

rmod:highspeedshooting.NAME: High Speed Shooting
rmod:highspeedshooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Ammunition. NL If you lost Ammunition, NL Add a copy of this card to your hand.

rmod:aviationdawn.NAME: Aviation Dawn
rmod:aviationdawn.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Aircraft to your hand. NL Lose 1 Aluminum. NL If you lost Aluminium, NL add !M! aircraft to hand.

rmod:diaomin.NAME: Fleet Training
rmod:diaomin.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Ammunition and Steel. NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

rmod:smokecover.NAME: Smoke Cover
rmod:smokecover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Steel. NL If you lost Steel, NL Gain !M! Blur.

rmod:gendarmerie.NAME: Military Police
rmod:gendarmerie.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL End your turn.

rmod:generalist.NAME: Versatile Cruiser
rmod:generalist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card.

rmod:bomber.NAME: aircraft
rmod:bomber.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies. NL Exhaust.

rmod:supportaircraftcarrier.NAME: Support Aircraft Carrier
rmod:supportaircraftcarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Aluminum. NL Add 1 random uncommon colorless card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.
rmod:supportaircraftcarrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Aluminum. NL Add 1 random rare colorless card to to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

rmod:shuttlebombing.NAME: Through Bombing
rmod:shuttlebombing.DESCRIPTION: When a colorless card is played this turn, add a copy of it to your draw pile.
rmod:shuttlebombing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When a colorless card is played this turn, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

rmod:stealaluminum.NAME: Steal Aluminum
rmod:stealaluminum.DESCRIPTION: At start of your turn, NL Lose 1 Fuel. NL Gain !M! Aluminum.

rmod:bulid.NAME: Build
rmod:bulid.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 of each Resource. NL Add 1 card to your hand from !M! cards of different rarities 3 times..

rmod:robin.NAME: Robin
rmod:robin.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Aluminum. NL If you lost Aluminium, NL Add 1 Aircraft that damage !M! the number of Aircraft you play this combat. NL (Minimum 5)

rmod:victimresponsibility.NAME: Injured Characters
rmod:victimresponsibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. (X is the number of aluminum.)

rmod:advancebysurprise.NAME: Assault
rmod:advancebysurprise.DESCRIPTION: Lose up to !M! Aluminum. NL Add aircraft with twice the amount of lost Aluminum to hand.

rmod:lastglory.NAME: Last Glory
rmod:lastglory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Ammunition. NL At the end of your turn, spend all remaining [E] . NL Reduce this card's cost this combat for all spent [E] .

rmod:supportescort.NAME: Support Escort
rmod:supportescort.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Steel. NL If you lost Steel, NL When an attack is played this turn, gain !M! Block.

rmod:selfconfidence.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage to All enemies.

rmod:aggressivemary.NAME: Aggressive Mary
rmod:aggressivemary.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The less life, the more damage.

rmod:combined.NAME: Joint Operations
rmod:combined.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Fuel. NL Draw X cards. NL (X is the number of the types of the cards played in this turn.)

rmod:rockthrower.NAME: Sling
rmod:rockthrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Double the effect in elite room and lose 1 Ammunition.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Double the effect in elite room and lose 1 Ammunition.
Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 4 Vulnerable. NL Double the effect in elite room and lose 1 Ammunition.

rmod:inadvertentlyimpact.NAME: Inadvertently impact
rmod:inadvertentlyimpact.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to half your total Block.
rmod:inadvertentlyimpact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to 80% of your total Block. NL Gain !B! Gold.

rmod:concentratefire.NAME: Concentrate Fire
rmod:concentratefire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Ammunition. NL Apply !M! Concentrate Fire.

rmod:ridicule.NAME: Mysterious Ridicule
rmod:ridicule.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

rmod:highspeedmaneuver.NAME: High Speed Maneuver
rmod:highspeedmaneuver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !M! times. NL Exhaust. NL Lose 1 Steel. NL NL If you lost Steel, NL This card doesn't Exhaust.

rmod:wasp.NAME: Crazy Bee
rmod:wasp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you get damage, NL Add !M! aircraft to hand.

rmod:supriseattacks.NAME: Suprise Attacks
rmod:supriseattacks.DESCRIPTION: Select a card fromm the exhaust pile and play it !M! time(s),and remove it from exhaust pile.

rmod:sl.NAME: Save and load
rmod:sl.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

rmod:u235.NAME: U235
rmod:u235.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 5 Fuel. NL Exhaust.

rmod:secretscript.DESCRIPTION: If you play at least 4 cards in this turn, NL Gain [E] next turn.
rmod:secretscript.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you play at least 4 cards in this turn, NL Gain [E] [E] next turn.

rmod:acesubmarine.NAME: Ace Submarine
rmod:acesubmarine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! ExtraVulnerable to ALL enemies.

rmod:abidefaith.NAME: Unswervingly
rmod:abidefaith.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have less than 3 Ammunition, NL Gain !M! Strength. NL If you have less than 3 Fuel, NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

rmod:windflower.NAME: Wind Flower
rmod:windflower.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Attacks cost 0. NL Exhaust. NL Lose 1 Ammunition. NL If you lost Ammunition, this card doesn't Exhaust.

rmod:diamondstrike.NAME: Diamond Strike
rmod:diamondstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Diamond to hand.

rmod:mineteam.NAME: The Torpedo Team
rmod:mineteam.DESCRIPTION: At start of your turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

rmod:goodfighter.NAME: A Skilled Fighter
rmod:goodfighter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemy 2X times.

rmod:spoils.NAME: Spoils Activity
rmod:spoils.DESCRIPTION: Lose All Resources. NL Gain twice as much gold as the amount of lost Resources. NL Exhaust.

rmod:slowdown.NAME: Slowly Operation
rmod:slowdown.DESCRIPTION: Add your previous !M! card(s) from the discard pile to hand.

rmod:garrisonisland.NAME: Garrison Island
rmod:garrisonisland.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Ammunition. NL If you lost Ammunition, NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

rmod:guardianhero.NAME: A Guardian Of Hero
rmod:guardianhero.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Decrease this card's Block by !M! this combat. NL Exhausts after being played 5 times.

rmod:intelligenceanalysis.NAME: Intelligence Analysis
rmod:intelligenceanalysis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Otherwise, apply !M! Weak.

rmod:attackagain.NAME: Attack Again
rmod:attackagain.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 Fuel ,Take an extra turn after this one.
